from typing import Any



[docs]class PynextError(Exception):
    """Base exception class for pynext."""

    __slots__ = ()

    def __init__(self, value: Any):
        super().__init__(value)




[docs]class HTTPTimeoutError(PynextError):
    """Called when the request reaches the limit set in http_timeout."""




[docs]class HTTPException(PynextError):
    """Called if the status is not OK, and no others exceptions have been called."""




[docs]class BadRequest(PynextError):
    """400 status code."""




[docs]class Unauthorized(PynextError):
    """401 status code."""




[docs]class Forbidden(PynextError):
    """403 status code."""




[docs]class NotFound(PynextError):
    """404 status code."""




[docs]class CaptchaRequired(PynextError):
    """Called when the request was detected as blocked by hcaptcha."""




[docs]class FunctionIsNotCoroutine(PynextError):
    """Called when we specify a synchronous function to the event."""




[docs]class WebsocketNotConnected(PynextError):
    """Called when user doesn't have connection to the gateway."""




[docs]class VoiceStateNotFound(PynextError):
    """Called when user has no voice state set for the guild."""
